user_query: most of which was in the setup I wouldn't be too surprised the second half of this movie that's where I really started loving it the last act of this movie was amazing yeah that that's me saying I was watching this movie going yeah it's enjoyable enough spy movie to going holy shit I just love this guy's imagination and I do I always appreciate that about Christopher Nolan in a world where there's remakes and prequels and remake wolves Christopher Nolan constantly is like I want to give something unique that makes them walk out of the movie theater feeling like they hadn't felt something like that before and I reached that in this movie it's the last half hour to be honest it's like I was of two minds in this movie I can't think recently of a time where I was sitting there going it's an enjoyable enough movie too at a point being like oh that's fucking amazing and I do want to touch on the sound mixing of this movie too which I want to tread lightly on because it could have just been the movie theater I watched it in some drunk projectionist shows up like this just turn up the baseball this is just fucked up all the sound human beings work in the projection booth however I ran into this with Interstellar and the sneak peek of Dark Knight Rises IMAX showed the first five minutes of Dark Knight Rises before Dark Knight Rises came out and Bane's mask he sounded like Kenny from South Park and so I guess Nolan remixed it for the movie that was coming out so Nolan's known for

entities.entity_description: 크리스토퍼 놀란은 독창적인 영화를 만드는 것으로 알려진 감독으로, 리메이크나 프리퀄 대신 관객들에게 새로운 경험을 선사하는 작품을 추구한다
인터스텔라는 크리스토퍼 놀란이 감독한 영화로, 사운드 믹싱 관련 이슈가 있었던 작품이다
다크 나이트 라이즈는 크리스토퍼 놀란이 감독한 영화로, IMAX 스닉 피크에서 첫 5분이 공개되었으며 베인의 마스크 음성 관련 사운드 믹싱 문제가 있었다
베인은 다크 나이트 라이즈에 등장하는 캐릭터로, 마스크를 착용하고 있으며 초기 버전에서는 음성이 불명확하여 사우스 파크의 케니처럼 들렸다는 평가를 받았다

relationships.relationship_description: 크리스토퍼 놀란은 다크 나이트 라이즈를 감독했으며 사운드 믹싱을 재조정했다
베인은 다크 나이트 라이즈에 등장하는 캐릭터이다
